media:group.media:title: Is Arabic a Single Language???
media:group.media:description:
In this Langfocus #shorts video I talk about whether Arabic can be considered a single language considering the diversity of its spoken dialects.

Check out my full-length videos on the Arabic Language: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLpw_A6Onkjc735WW3cmO8lMGt_4mScaxL
